## finimom

<img src="figures/finimom.png" style="width:25%; margin-left: 20px" align="right">

I am the author and maintainer of finimom, an R package for fine-mapping genetic summary data
using a non-local prior.
Package website: [https://github.com/vkarhune/finimom](https://github.com/vkarhune/finimom).
